title: Quickly Access College Basketball Data
text: functions take seasons argument seasons query. Data typically available 2003 present season, error thrown data available specified season. Calling functions -load data recent (current) college basketball season. return available seasons given resource, just pass TRUE argument function. functions load resources specified year, thus take argument.
code: library(cbbreadr) # with no argument, returns most recent season load_games() # specify a single season load_games(2023) # specify a range of seasons load_games(2010:2015) # return all available seasons load_games(TRUE) # does not take any arguments load_conferences()

title: Quickly Access College Basketball Data
text: cbbreadr relies several automated pipelines GitHub keep data resources updated. largely static data objects (load_conferences()), pipelines run year. frequently updated data objects (load_plays()), pipelines run daily college basketball season. view data resource recently updated, see .

what: get the most recent CBB season — most_recent_season
title: get the most recent CBB season — most_recent_season
text: given date (defaults system date), returns recent "current" college basketball season.

title: get the most recent CBB season — most_recent_season
get the most recent CBB season — most_recent_season
text: date date obtain recent season . Defaults system date.

title: get the most recent CBB season — most_recent_season
text: recent CBB season integer

title: get the most recent CBB season — most_recent_season
code: # \donttest{ most_recent_season() #> [1] 2025  most_recent_season("2022-09-01") # up to september, will be recorded as 2022 #> [1] 2022  most_recent_season("2022-10-01") # then will swap over to 2023 when we hit october #> [1] 2023 # }

title: cbbreadr 1.0.0
text: Initial CRAN submission. load_conferences() - conference data load_games() - games load_lines() - betting markets load_media() - broadcasting information load_player_box_scores() - player-game-level box score data load_player_stats() - player-season-level box score data load_plays() - tracked plays specified season(s) load_rankings() - AP Coaches poll results load_recruiting() - 247 recruiting data load_rosters() - team rosters specified season(s) load_team_box_scores() - team-game-level box score data load_team_stats() - team-season-level box score data load_teams() - team data load_venues() - venues arenas Added helper function most_recent_season() returns either recent current NCAA season. Added full documentation functions Added data dictionaries available resources
